languages.text: "Меня учили, что плебсы склонны преувеличивать собственные страдания от лености и слабости духа. Но этот парень... Багряные шипы пронизывают все его тело, а сизые кандалы сковывают руки, и ноги, и шею... В словах нет лжи. Лишь безграничный ужас и отчаяние".

"I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."
languages.original_text: "Меня учили, что плебсы склонны преувеличивать собственные страдания от лености и слабости духа. Но этот парень... Багряные шипы пронизывают все его тело, а сизые кандалы сковывают руки, и ноги, и шею... В словах нет лжи. Лишь безграничный ужас и отчаяние".

Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

"I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

"I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

"I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

languages.text: 「あたくしは、農民は怠惰で精神が弱いため、苦しみを誇張する傾向があると教えられました。しかし、この若者は…全身に朱色の棘が刺さり、灰色の足かせが手、足、首を縛っています…彼の言葉には偽りはありません。ただ恐怖と絶望だけです」
languages.original_text: "I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしは、農民は怠惰で精神が弱いため、苦しみを誇張する傾向があると教えられました。しかし、この若者は…全身に朱色の棘が刺さり、灰色の足かせが手、足、首を縛っています…彼の言葉には偽りはありません。ただ恐怖と絶望だけです」

languages.text: « On m'a appris que les paysans avaient tendance à exagérer leurs souffrances en raison de leur paresse et de leur faiblesse d'esprit. Mais ce jeune homme... Des épines écarlates transpercent chaque centimètre de son corps, et des fers enserrent son cou, ses mains et ses pieds... Il ne ment pas. Je ne ressens que de la terreur et un désespoir sans fin. »
languages.original_text: "I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

traits.locale_text: « On m'a appris que les paysans avaient tendance à exagérer leurs souffrances en raison de leur paresse et de leur faiblesse d'esprit. Mais ce jeune homme... Des épines écarlates transpercent chaque centimètre de son corps, et des fers enserrent son cou, ses mains et ses pieds... Il ne ment pas. Je ne ressens que de la terreur et un désespoir sans fin. »

languages.text: “我听说，农奴由于懒惰、软弱，往往会夸大自己的痛苦。可这个年轻人……血红色的荆棘刺穿了他身体的每寸皮肤，灰色的镣铐束缚着他的手脚和脖子……他的话里没有一丝谎言，只有无尽的恐惧和绝望。”
languages.original_text: "I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

traits.locale_text: “我听说，农奴由于懒惰、软弱，往往会夸大自己的痛苦。可这个年轻人……血红色的荆棘刺穿了他身体的每寸皮肤，灰色的镣铐束缚着他的手脚和脖子……他的话里没有一丝谎言，只有无尽的恐惧和绝望。”

languages.text: «En su día me enseñaron que los plebeyos tienden a exagerar su sufrimiento por pereza y debilidad de espíritu. Pero este joven... tiene espinas carmesíes en cada centímetro de su cuerpo. Y grilletes grises en las manos, pies y cuello... No hay mentira en sus palabras. Únicamente terror y desesperación desmedidos».
languages.original_text: "I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

traits.locale_text: «En su día me enseñaron que los plebeyos tienden a exagerar su sufrimiento por pereza y debilidad de espíritu. Pero este joven... tiene espinas carmesíes en cada centímetro de su cuerpo. Y grilletes grises en las manos, pies y cuello... No hay mentira en sus palabras. Únicamente terror y desesperación desmedidos».

languages.text: "Ich wurde gelehrt, dass der Pöbel dazu neigt, sein Leid übertrieben darzustellen, aus Faulheit und Willensschwäche. Doch dieser junge Mann ... Zinnoberrote Dornen haben jeden Zentimeter seines Körpers durchbohrt, und graue Fesseln binden seine Hände, seine Füße und seinen Hals ... In seinen Worten liegen keine Lügen. Nur endlose Angst und Verzweiflung."
languages.original_text: "I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde gelehrt, dass der Pöbel dazu neigt, sein Leid übertrieben darzustellen, aus Faulheit und Willensschwäche. Doch dieser junge Mann ... Zinnoberrote Dornen haben jeden Zentimeter seines Körpers durchbohrt, und graue Fesseln binden seine Hände, seine Füße und seinen Hals ... In seinen Worten liegen keine Lügen. Nur endlose Angst und Verzweiflung."

languages.text: "Bana köylülerin tembellikleri ve ruhlarının zayıflıkları nedeniyle yaşadıkları ızdırabı abartma eğiliminde oldukları öğretildi. Ancak bu genç adamın bedeninin her bir santimetresi kızıl dikenlerle delinmiş; elleri, ayakları ve boynu gri zincirlerle bağlanmış. Sözlerinde yalan yok, yalnızca sonsuz bir korku ve umutsuzluk var."
languages.original_text: "I was taught that peasants have a tendency to exaggerate their suffering due to sloth and weakness of spirit. But this young man... Vermilion thorns pierce every centimetre of his body, and grey shackles bind his hands, feet, and neck... There are no lies in his words. Only terror and desperation without end."

Ancak bu genç adamın bedeninin her bir santimetresi kızıl dikenlerle delinmiş; elleri, ayakları ve boynu gri zincirlerle bağlanmış. Sözlerinde yalan yok, yalnızca sonsuz bir korku ve umutsuzluk var."
